alert.note: Alert for Alger; Schoolcraft (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 8:43PM EDT until July 10 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: The National Weather Service in Marquette has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Schoolcraft County in east central Upper Michigan... Northeastern Alger County in north central Upper Michigan... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 843 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Chapel Lake, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Grand Marais, Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore, Chapel Lake, Grand Sable Dunes, Beaver Lake, Grand Portal Point, Snyder Lake, Au Sable Point, Nawakwa Lake and Kingston Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
